scripts.test-community-passport: cd ./community-passport && npx hardhat clean && npm run test
scripts.test-community-passport-creater: cd ./community-passport-creater && npx hardhat clean && npm run test
scripts.test-community-portal: cd ./community-portal && npx hardhat clean && npm run test
scripts.test-prize-poap: cd ./prize-poap && npx hardhat clean && npm run test
scripts.test-cube: cd ./cube && npx hardhat clean && npm run test
scripts.test-quest-board: cd ./quest-board && npx hardhat clean && npm run test
scripts.test-quest-checker: cd ./quest-checker && npx hardhat clean && npm run test
scripts.test-quest-checker-creater: cd ./quest-checker-creater && npx hardhat clean && npm run test
scripts.test: npm run test-community-passport && npm run test-community-passport-creater && npm run test-community-portal && npm run test-prize-poap && npm run test-cube && npm run test-quest-board && npm run test-quest-checker && npm run test-quest-checker-creater
scripts.update-community-passport: cd ./community-passport && npx -p npm-check-updates  -c 'ncu' && npx -p npm-check-updates  -c 'ncu -u' && npm i
scripts.update-community-passport-creater: cd ./community-passport-creater && npx -p npm-check-updates  -c 'ncu' && npx -p npm-check-updates  -c 'ncu -u' && npm i
scripts.update-community-portal: cd ./community-portal && npx -p npm-check-updates  -c 'ncu' && npx -p npm-check-updates  -c 'ncu -u' && npm i
scripts.update-prize-poap: cd ./prize-poap && npx -p npm-check-updates  -c 'ncu' && npx -p npm-check-updates  -c 'ncu -u' && npm i
scripts.update-cube: cd ./cube && npx -p npm-check-updates  -c 'ncu' && npx -p npm-check-updates  -c 'ncu -u' && npm i
scripts.update-quest-board: cd ./quest-board && npx -p npm-check-updates  -c 'ncu' && npx -p npm-check-updates  -c 'ncu -u' && npm i
scripts.update-quest-checker: cd ./quest-checker && npx -p npm-check-updates  -c 'ncu' && npx -p npm-check-updates  -c 'ncu -u' && npm i
scripts.update-quest-checker-creater: cd ./quest-checker-creater && npx -p npm-check-updates  -c 'ncu' && npx -p npm-check-updates  -c 'ncu -u' && npm i
scripts.update: npm run update-community-passport && npm run update-community-passport-creater && npm run update-community-portal && npm run update-prize-poap && npm run update-cube && npm run update-quest-board && npm run update-quest-checker && npm run update-quest-checker-creater
scripts.format: npm run format-community-passport && npm run format-community-passport-creater && npm run format-community-portal && npm run format-prize-poap && npm run format-cube && npm run format-quest-board && npm run format-quest-checker && npm run format-quest-checker-creater
